personality.addon_registry.name: Addon
personality.info_reveal_registry.name: Info Reveal
origin.personality.unknown.name: Unknown
origin.personality.unknown.description: Currently Unknown to you, you can ask them or wait until they tell you?
text.config.personality.title: Personality Config
text.config.personality.category.fasterE: Controls a increase effect of Exhaustion on the given Age Range that weakens as you Age
text.config.personality.category.fasterH: Controls a effect on a Players healing allowing for faster Regeneration for a given Age Range that weakens as you Age
text.config.personality.category.minimum: Controls the minimum amount of Hunger Bar needed to start Healing for a given Age Range that weakens as you Age
text.config.personality.category.agingSl: Controls a Slowness Infliction that will increase with getting closer to the maximum Age
text.config.personality.category.agingBl: Controls a Blurriness Infliction that will increase with getting closer to the maximum Age
text.config.personality.category.extraAg: Configuration that adjusts how a given character will get in Extra Age
text.config.personality.option.extraAgeC: Minimum Hours before encoring Extra life
Curve used to Calculate that amount of Extra Age
text.config.personality.option.defaultMa: Default Maximum Age for a Character
text.config.personality.option.maximumEx: Maximum Extra age allow for a Given Character
text.config.personality.option.moderatio: List use to control who has access to Moderation Aspects of Personality's internals
text.config.personality.option.administr: List use to control who has access to Administration Aspects of Personality's internals
text.config.personality.option.adjustWid: Pehkui: Adjust only Width and Height
text.config.personality.option.themeMode: Change this setting if your want either the light mode or dark mode version of the Personality UI
text.config.personality.option.showPlaye: Only works if the given player has a character
Show Player Nameplate at Chest Level
text.config.personality.option.disableSp: Disables the Sponsor Component found on some screens
text.config.personality.option.showInWor: [WIP] Show In World Description tooltips when looking at the player
text.config.personality.option.minimumIn: Set what the Minimum starting knowledge everyone will get when giving info
text.config.personality.option.none_tier: Information that will be given when at this given Tier for Knowing someone
text.config.personality.option.general_t: Information that will be given when at this given Tier for Knowing someone
text.config.personality.option.associate: Information that will be given when at this given Tier for Knowing someone
text.config.personality.option.trusted_t: Information that will be given when at this given Tier for Knowing someone
text.config.personality.option.confidant: Information that will be given when at this given Tier for Knowing someone
